page.title: 13MIXED FARMING
page.content: In the farmer's barn were two piles of { wheat}and{barley}.We went to see his { machines}.We saw a combine harvester, wind tunnel,an egg grader,spraying machinery,grain auger,plough,tractor and fertiliser spreader. The farmer had 4,000{battery hens} caged in five rows and four layers. The hens made lots of noise and flapped about.When the lights were turned off they settled again. We saw some{piglets}.The farmer picked them up by the back legs.We held one and its skin felt rough.The piggery smelled when we first went in but we soon got used to it.We thanked the farmer for allowing us to visit his farm.
